00029 #ifndef __PLANE_BOUNDED_VOLUME_H_
00030 #define __PLANE_BOUNDED_VOLUME_H_
00031 
00032 #include "AlignedBox.h"
00033 #include "Math.h"
00034 #include "Plane.h"
00035 
00036 namespace omega { namespace math 
00037 {
00040         template<typename T>
00041     class PlaneBoundedVolume
00042     {
00043     public:
00044         typedef std::vector<Plane<T> > PlaneList;
00046         PlaneList planes;
00047         PlaneSide outside;
00048 
00049         PlaneBoundedVolume() :outside(NEGATIVE_SIDE) {}
00051         PlaneBoundedVolume(PlaneSide theOutside) 
00052             : outside(theOutside) {}
00053 
00057         inline bool intersects(const AlignedBox3<T>& box) const
00058         {
00059             if (box.isNull()) return false;
00060             if (box.isInfinite()) return true;
00061 
00062             // Get centre of the box
00063             vector<3,T> centre = box.getCenter();
00064             // Get the half-size of the box
00065             vector<3,T> halfSize = box.getHalfSize();
00066             
00067             typename PlaneList::const_iterator i, iend;
00068             iend = planes.end();
00069             for (i = planes.begin(); i != iend; ++i)
00070             {
00071                 const Plane<T> & plane = *i;
00072 
00073                 PlaneSide side = plane.getSide(centre, halfSize);
00074                 if (side == outside)
00075                 {
00076                     // Found a splitting plane therefore return not intersecting
00077                     return false;
00078                 }
00079             }
00080 
00081             // couldn't find a splitting plane, assume intersecting
00082             return true;
00083 
00084         }
00088         inline bool intersects(const Sphere<T>& sphere) const
00089         {
00090             typename PlaneList::const_iterator i, iend;
00091             iend = planes.end();
00092             for (i = planes.begin(); i != iend; ++i)
00093             {
00094                 const Plane<T> & plane = *i;
00095 
00096                 // Test which side of the plane the sphere is
00097                 float d = plane.getDistance(sphere.getCenter());
00098                 // Negate d if planes point inwards
00099                 if (outside == NEGATIVE_SIDE) d = -d;
00100 
00101                 if ( (d - sphere.getRadius()) > 0)
00102                     return false;
00103             }
00104 
00105             return true;
00106 
00107         }
00108 
00113         inline std::pair<bool, float> intersects(const Ray<T>& ray)
00114         {
00115             return Math<T>::intersects(ray, planes, outside == Plane<T> ::POSITIVE_SIDE);
00116         }
00117 
00118     };
00119 }
00120 }
00121 
00122 #endif
